H2.text: Orange juice is not a mixture.

H3.text: Salt is not a mixture, as the question asks which of the following is NOT a mixture.

A4.text: Sea salt and mined salt may contain trace elements.

A5.text: Common salt has a 1:1 molar ratio of sodium and chlorine.

A6.text: The attraction between the Na+ and Clâˆ’ ions in the solid is so strong that only highly polar solvents like water dissolve NaCl well.
